summary: Tirante the knight is as committed to fighting the Turks in Constantinople as he is to relieving Carmesina, the heiress to the Byzantine Empire, of her virginity.
cast: Caspar Zafer|Esther Nubiola|Leonor Watling|Ingrid Rubio|Jane Asher|Charlie Cox|Sid Mitchell|Rafael Amargo|José Antonio Marín|Jay Benedict|Victoria Abril|Giancarlo Giannini|Rebeca Cobos|Valentina Burgueño|Julio Vélez|Ismael Martínez|Víctor Rivas|Eugenio Jiménez|Ramón G. del Pomar|Sabrina Praga|Rocco Salata|Francesco Giordano|F. Paolo Matera|Juanjo Mugica|Fernando Prados
title: Tirante el Blanco
